DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine efficacy lifestyle modification telehealth program health-related behaviour community-dwelling individual live stroke .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants recruit study randomly assign either Healthy Lifestyle Training Program , Attention Control Memory Training Program . Individuals Healthy Lifestyle Training Program receive 7 lifestyle coach telephone-sessions ( 30-60 minute ) train lifestyle coach 6 month period . Individuals Memory Training Program receive 7 memory coach telephone session ( 30-60 minute ) train memory training coach 6 month period . 100 evaluable subject recruit ( 124 accommodate 20 % dropout ) .
